Package carpooling_package

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    passenger_interface
    passenger_interface is an interface that contains 2 methods: enterName() and enterAge()
    Passenger class is the class that implements this interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Car
    This class contains everything related to the Car Class
    CarPooling
    Car Pooling
    Non_Subsciber
    Non_Subsciber is a Class that contains all the data that related to the Non-Subscriber users
    is also a child and its parent is Passenger class.
    Passenger
    Passenger is an abstract class that contains some variables and they
    ID, chosen_route, Alowed_age, passenger_name, passenger_age, isSubscriber(boolean) and num_trips.
    Process
    It's a class that controls on moving from function to another and the branching of the methods.
    RootClass  
    Subsciber
    Subsciber is a Class that contains all the data that related to the Subsciber users
    is also a child and its parent is Passenger class.
    Ticket
    This class contains all the methods that related to The Ticket.
